name: Baxton_Studio_Petito_Contemporary_1-tier_Black_Faux_Leather_Upholstered_Shoe_Cabinet
reviews: I bought this to store my dress shoes, as I don't have or need many pairs. It's a nice little shoe cabinet with a modern look. The quality is very good for the price. Would recommend.
description: This Petito White 1-tier Leather Upholstered Storage Shoe Cabinet, with a metal pull out handle, provides you with ample shoe storage and a comfortable place to sit while you removing your shoes. This shoe cabinet will add style and elegance to any home and takes shoe storage to a whole new level.Set includes: One (1) shoe cabinetContemporary shoe cabinetMDF frame with white faux leather upholsteryCan be used as a seating bench, seating capacity 150 lbs1-tier fold out shoe rack with shoe storage capacity 6 pairs of adult shoesMetal pull-out handleLegs assembly requiredMaterials: Faux leather, foam, MDFFinish: Black plastic legsUpholstery color: WhiteUpholstery fill: Foam paddingDrawer dimensions: 12 inches high x 21.25 inches wide x 4 inches deepDimensions (overall): 16.75 inches high x 24.1 inches wide x 12.1 inches deepStyleContemporaryMaterialFaux Leather, MDF, WoodFinishBlack FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhiteDresser TypeShoe CabinetProduct FeaturesIncludes Hardware
